code: import Login from'../pages/Login';import Home from'../pages/Home';import Error404 from'../components/Error404';import HeaderOnly from'../components/Layout/HeaderOnly';var token=localStorage.getItem('access_token');var publicRoutes=[];if(!token){publicRoutes=[{path:'/',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}else{publicRoutes=[{path:'/',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'/home',component:Home,layout:HeaderOnly},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}var privateRoutes=[];export{publicRoutes,privateRoutes};
